description: A balanced portfolio offering a mix of growth and stability. Ideal for medium risk investors and multi-year goals.
suitable_for: Those balancing wealth creation with capital safety
Individuals wanting diversification in a single strategy
recommended_lumpsum_use: Deploy in 3–6 tranches via STP due to 50% equity exposure.
historical_behaviour: Stable recovery speed due to diversification.
Large-caps provide backbone stability while mid/small caps deliver growth.
Debt helps maintain portfolio stability during volatility spikes.
rebalancing_strategy: Rebalance annually or when equity exceeds 55% due to bull markets.
rationale: Balanced exposure ensures smoother returns than pure equity portfolios.
Debt stabilizes returns and reduces impact of market crashes.
Gold protects against macroeconomic shocks and inflation.
Ideal blend for long-term investors needing growth with controlled risk.
